meanings.definition: A protective covering worn over the shin to prevent injury during sports or other physical activities.
meanings.sent1: During soccer practice, the coach emphasized the importance of wearing shinguards.
meanings.sent2: The young athlete put on her shinguards before heading out to play hockey.
meanings.sent3: When the clumsy player tripped over his own feet, his shinguards saved the day!
meanings.sent4: Her shinguards were like knights protecting her shins in the battlefield of the basketball court.
meanings.sent5: The bright red shinguards stood out, reminding everyone of the need for safety in sports.
